form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Cassidy (for himself and Mr. Blumenthal) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans’ Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to direct the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to regularly promote programs under chapter 31 of such title.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Informing Veterans on Education for Transitioning Servicemembers Act of 2025 or the Informing VETS Act of 2025.

section.header: Information campaign regarding Veteran Readiness and Employment Program
section.text: Section 3116 of title 38, United States Code, is amended by adding at the end the following new subsection:

subsection.text: The Secretary shall regularly promote programs under this chapter by—

paragraph.text: sending a letter to each veteran entitled to such a program that explains the educational benefits of such programs; and
providing a side-by-side comparison of benefits between such programs and educational assistance under chapter 33 of this title—

subparagraph.text: with each letter under paragraph (1); and
on a publicly accessible website of the Department.
